snippet: The project, which takes physical form this week at an interactive pavilion at Sundance, consists of video interviews with dozens of high-achieving creatives. Over the next two weeks, T will exclusively present samples of Aitken’s conversations for...
abstract: The project, which takes physical form this week at an interactive pavilion at Sundance, consists of video interviews with dozens of high-achieving creatives. Over the next two weeks, T will exclusively present samples of Aitken’s conversations for the Source with people like Tilda Swinton, James Turrell, Alice Waters and more.

headline.main: Q. and A. | Doug Aitken Unveils the Source, a Collective Meditation on the Nature of Creativity
